member.name: P:WCSharp.Lightnings.Lightning.TargetHeightOffset

member.name: P:WCSharp.Lightnings.Lightning.Red

member.name: P:WCSharp.Lightnings.Lightning.Green

member.name: P:WCSharp.Lightnings.Lightning.Blue
